topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Hackers are exploiting critical-severity vulnerabilities in multiple Fortinet products to gain unauthorized access to admin accounts and steal system configuration files. Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/bleepingcomputer.com/post/3ma4j7633wu2y
- https://www.bleepingcomputer.com

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A massive data breach at 700Credit exposed personal information of millions of consumers, including SSNs, names, and addresses. Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackread.bsky.social/post/3ma3w5br5bk2x
- https://hackread.com/700credit-data-breach-exposing-details-of-5-6-million-consumers

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A new React bug is being exploited to drain tokens, impacting thousands of websites and deploying malware and crypto-mining software. Sources:
- https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2025/12/16/new-react-bug-that-can-drain-all-your-tokens-is-impacting-thousands-of-websites

entities: BreachForums, French Ministry of the Interior
topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
BreachForums claims responsibility for a hack on the French Ministry of the Interior, accessing data of over 16 million individuals and issuing a one-week ultimatum before potential data leaks. Sources:
- https://twitter.com/877710712734232576/status/2000800230162190412
